instruction: Create an outline of steps to take when starting a business.
output:
When starting a business, one should take the following steps to ensure success:
Step 1: Develop a Business Plan
Step 2: Pick a Business Location
Step 3: Obtain the Necessary Licenses and Permits
Step 4: Pick a Business Structure
Step 5: Open a Business Bank Account
Step 6: Get Insurance Covered
Step 7: Purchase Necessary Equipment and Furnishings
Step 8: Market Your Business
Step 9: Manage Your Finances 
Step 10: Evaluate and Monitor Your Progress
